snippet: Coast Guard officials stressed that a more narrow cleanup response to the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill would continue.
abstract: BP announces it is ending what it terms 'active cleanup' of Louisiana's coast almost four years after Deepwater Horizon oil spill; Coast Guard officials stress that a more narrow cleanup response will continue, with crews remaining on Gulf Coast to respond to new reports of oil, and that responsible party will be held accountable for cleanup costs.
lead_paragraph: Coast Guard officials stressed that a more narrow cleanup response to the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill would continue.

headline.main: ‘Active Cleanup’ of Oil Spill Is Ended on Louisiana Coast
headline.print_headline: ‘Active Cleanup’ of Oil Spill Is Ended on Louisiana Coast
